SELECT final.* , LAG(final.delimiter) OVER (ORDER BY final.cmmt_idx) AS recmmt_start , LEAD(final.delimiter) OVER(ORDER BY final.cmmt_idx) AS recmmt_end FROM ( SELECT c.*, t.recmmt_cnt, if(c.parent_cmmt_idx IS NULL, 'Y', 'N') as 'delimiter' FROM comment c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT temp.root_idx, count(temp.root_idx) AS 'recmmt_cnt' FROM ( SELECT *, SUBSTRING_INDEX(parent_cmmt_idx , '-', 1) AS 'root_idx' FROM comment WHERE board_idx = #{boardIdx} ) temp GROUP BY temp.root_idx HAVING root_idx IS NOT NULL ) t ON c.cmmt_idx = t.root_idx WHERE board_idx = #{boardIdx} ORDER BY cmmt_idx ) final LIMIT #{pageBlock} OFFSET #{pageOffset}
